meta.label: Text Embedding
meta.description: Compute numerical representations for text data so that they can be fed to ML algorithms
meta.author: Dataiku (Hicham El Boukkouri)

params.name: proxy
params.label: Proxy settings
params.description:
Needs to follow Python's requests specifications.
Example:
http --> http://10.10.1.10:3128
https --> http://10.10.1.10:1080
